title: Interview with Douglas Holtz-Eakin
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Douglas Holtz-Eakin, president of American Action Forum and formerly a member of George H.W. Bush’s Council of Economic Advisors, director of the Congressional Budget Office and chief economic advisor to John McCain’s presidential campaign, shares his thoughts on the cutting economic issues of our time, such as the impact of tax reform on U.S. growth and how the government can deescalate the rampant increase in debt. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
